mapper.select: select ga.id, ga.name, ga.code, ga.typename, ga.classcode, ST_AsText(ga.geo,'axis-order=long-lat') as geo from gis_area ga where ga.classcode = 1 and ga.remark is null

SELECT x.id, x.name, x.code, x.typename, x.classcode, x.province_code, x.province_name, x.eng_name, x.var_name, x.eng_typename, ST_AsText(x.geo,'axis-order=long-lat') as geo FROM gis_area x where x.classcode=1
